sen.j: 七条大宮仏所（しちじょうおおみやぶっしょ）は、平安時代の仏師工房。
sen.e: Shichijo Omiya Bussho was a Buddhist sculpture workshop that operated in the Heian period.

sen.e: It was founded by Injo, who was the second son of Kakujo, who was a son of Jocho.
